hydrogen:build.description: Builds a Hydrogen storefront for production.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

disable-route-warning.name: disable-route-warning
disable-route-warning.description: Disable warning about missing standard routes.

hydrogen:check.description: Returns diagnostic information about a Hydrogen storefront.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

args.name: resource
args.description: The resource to check. Currently only 'routes' is supported.

environmentTag.name: environmentTag
environmentTag.description: Tag of the environment to deploy to

metadataUrl.name: metadataUrl
metadataUrl.description: URL that links to the deployment

metadataVersion.name: metadataVersion
metadataVersion.description: A version identifier for the deployment

hydrogen:dev.description: Runs Hydrogen storefront in an Oxygen worker for development.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

port.name: port
port.description: Port to run the server on.

disable-virtual-routes.name: disable-virtual-routes
disable-virtual-routes.description: Disable rendering fallback routes when a route file doesn't exist

hydrogen:g.description: Shortcut for `hydrogen generate`. See `hydrogen generate --help` for more information.

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the new Hydrogen storefront.

language.name: language
language.description: Sets the template language to use. One of `js` or `ts`.

template.name: template
template.description: Sets the template to use. One of `demo-store` or `hello-world`.

install-deps.name: install-deps
install-deps.description: Auto install dependencies using the active package manager

hydrogen:link.description: Link a local project to one of your shop's Hydrogen storefronts.

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

shop.name: shop
shop.description: Shop URL. It can be the shop prefix (janes-apparel) or the full myshopify.com URL (janes-apparel.myshopify.com, https://janes-apparel.myshopify.com).

storefront.name: storefront
storefront.description: The name of a Hydrogen Storefront (e.g. "Jane's Apparel")

hydrogen:list.description: Returns a list of Hydrogen storefronts available on a given shop.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

shop.name: shop
shop.description: Shop URL. It can be the shop prefix (janes-apparel) or the full myshopify.com URL (janes-apparel.myshopify.com, https://janes-apparel.myshopify.com).

hydrogen:preview.description: Runs a Hydrogen storefront in an Oxygen worker for production.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

port.name: port
port.description: Port to run the server on.

hydrogen:shortcut.description: Creates a global `h2` shortcut for the Hydrogen CLI

hydrogen:unlink.description: Unlink a local project from a Hydrogen storefront.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

hydrogen:env:pull.description: Populate your .env with variables from your Hydrogen storefront.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

shop.name: shop
shop.description: Shop URL. It can be the shop prefix (janes-apparel) or the full myshopify.com URL (janes-apparel.myshopify.com, https://janes-apparel.myshopify.com).

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

adapter.name: adapter
adapter.description: Remix adapter used in the route. The default is `@shopify/remix-oxygen`.

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.

args.name: route
args.description: The route to generate. One of home,page,cart,products,collections,policies,robots,sitemap,account,all.

hydrogen:generate:routes.description: Generates all supported standard shopify routes.

adapter.name: adapter
adapter.description: Remix adapter used in the route. The default is `@shopify/remix-oxygen`.

force.name: force
force.description: Overwrite the destination directory and files if they already exist.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory of the Hydrogen storefront. The default is the current directory.
